content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipėda district court the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant has been awarded a plot of land with buildings but they also have joint obligations towards two creditors the court has ordered the defendant to pay the applicant compensation and vice versa the court has addressed various legal issues related to compensation obligations property division and creditor obligations the court has also ordered both parties to pay costs in summary the court has granted the applicants request for divorce awarded them the land plot and addressed the financial obligations between the parties
